titles.title: Strategy and Investment in Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2019
Strategy and Investment in Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2019
Strategy and Investment in Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2019
Strategy and Investment in Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2019
Strategy and Investment in Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2019
Strategy and Investment in Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2019

To provide rental assistance to low-income tenants in certain multifamily rural housing projects financed by the Rural Housing Service of the Department of Agriculture, and to develop and implement a plan for preserving the affordability of rural rental housing, and for other purposes.
Strategy and Investment in Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 57 - 0.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 116-198.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 156.

action.text: Mr. San Nicolas moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3620.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
